globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://js.monitor.azure.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src-elem 'self'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.applicationinsights.azure.com; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self';
